            Sally A.M. Hogenboom
          
          
            
              
              Affiliations
              I’m conducting my work as part of the Institute for Logic, Lanugauge and Computation at the University of Amsterdam in the Netherlands.
              
              
              Collaborations
              For ongoing collaborations (e.g., my supervisors) please see the bias-barometer project website
              
              
              Funding
              The research we conduct is funded by the Dutch Research Council (NWO) as part of the project The Biased Reality of Online Media

articles.title: Academic CV
articles.contents:
VWO
2004 - 2010
CSG Blaise Pascal, Spijkenisse, the Netherlands A-level equivalent Dutch, English, German, Physics, Science, Math, Biology, and Sports and Community




Bachelor Psychology
2010 - 2012; 2015 - 2016
Erasmus University Rotterdam, the Netherlands Major: Clinical Psychology Grade: 7.5/10




Research Master Psychology
2016 - 2018
University of Amsterdam, the Netherlands Major: Social Psychology Minor: Psychological Methods and Techniques Grade: 8/10 (Cum Laude)
